product.short_description:
Instantly recognisable, Converse sneakers started as a cult favourite basketball shoe and grew to become a global phenomenon. The heritage brand’s designs are celebrated for their timeless simplicity and quality craftsmanship, while retaining a spirit of individuality and rebellion. With their street-meets-sport aesthetic, there’s a Converse style to suit every occasion. 

- Bodysuit Length: 35cm (size 0-6 months) 
- Bodysuit, hat and bootie socks set 
- Stretch cotton jersey knit 
- Optic white with red accents  
- Ribbed enveloped neckline 
- Short sleeves 
- Star centre logo to chest; navy and red 
- Folded cuff with blue embroidered branding on beanie hat and socks 
- Presented in gift box

Choose from tanks, tees and shorts alongside the brand’s signature Wondersuits to keep your bub cosy and comfortable all year round.

With an unwavering mission to celebrate originality, sports lifestyle giant adidas Sportswear recognises its rich sporting heritage and combines it with contemporary style codes to inspire all in their everyday lives. A seamless mix of technical prowess and street-ready design has helped to cement the status of the adidas Sportswear brand as an icon around the globe. With Trefoil logo tees, sweats and outerwear sitting alongside an inimitable sneaker edit, adidas Sportswear is the backbone of any off-duty rotation.
